content: something such as use crate::{ seems to have really bad error recovery overall, it flags nearly every single token in the file as an error. Has this been investigated before? I can try implementing better recovery if its doable since i know the parser pretty well.

I have been thinking if the lexer can insert one or more fake } token when it finds a keyword that is not allowed inside a use item The lexer can assume that a use item starts at the use keyword and ends at ; or when all { have been closed.
